properties.displayName: UAC Bypass Using MSConfig Token Modification - Process
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine =~ "\"C:\\Windows\\system32\\msconfig.exe\" -5" and (ProcessIntegrityLevel in~ ("High", "System")) and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\pkgmgr.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: etects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a msconfig GUI hack (UACMe 5
